Text.val: 04-JAN-2006 AS, SCR#9990. After successfully storing files to archive pickup
directory we set the status of the HYPB row to 'P'(ending)
Existing file selected ... scan import file
Compare numer of lines in import file with number of lines in HYPB
error#2: number of lines in selected import file and HYPB do not match

ExpSyntax.val: 'number of HYPB rows ('&Trim (Str ({0,9},''))&') does not match number of files in import file ('&Trim (Str ({0,8},''))&')'

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT COUNT(*) AS N FROM :1/HYPB WHERE HYPB_BATCHNO=:2

Text.val: Loops over all HYPB rows with HYPB_BATCHNO=pi.HYPB_BATCHNO ...
In case of success, set staus to 'P' (Pending). Remember: We do not really
archive. We just copied a file to a pickup directory.
iBOLT flow checkscanneddocuments will see if its finally landed in the archive
and set the flag to Y (Scanned=Yes)
